Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Sercotel Amister Art Hotel, you'll be centrally located in Barcelona, convenient to Casa Golferichs and Casa Batllo. This 4-star hotel is close to Palau de la Musica Catalana and Sagrada Familia.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 59 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs feature designer toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include laptop-compatible safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a rooftop terrace. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast and lunch, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a business center, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Planning an event in Barcelona? This hotel has facilities measuring 1399 square feet (130 square meters), including a meeting room.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast and lunch, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Casa Golferichs - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Hospital Clinic - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Joan Miro Park - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Placa d'Espanya - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Placa Universitat - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Francesc Macia Plaza - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Sant Antoni Market - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
University of Barcelona - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Park of Industrial Spain - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Francisco Godia Foundation - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Centre de Cultura Contemporania de Barcelona - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Barcelona Museum of Contemporary Art - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Fundacio Antoni Tapies - 1.4 km / 0.8 mi
Bulevard Rosa - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Casa Amatller - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi

The preferred airport for Sercotel Amister Art Hotel is Barcelona (BCN-Barcelona Intl.) - 11 km / 6.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Hotel Amister Barcelona is Barcelona (BCN-Barcelona Intl.) - 11 km / 6.8 mi.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
Room 1
Check in time: 2pmCheck out time: 12pm
Notice
The Catalan government applies a tax regulation for hotel stays in Catalonia. The charges are per person (age 17 and over) per night (up to 7 nights stay) and are applicable by the following scheme: Catalonia: 5* hotel Barcelona City 2.48 VAT included and Rest of Catalonia 2.48 VAT included 4* hotel Barcelona City 1.21 VAT included and Rest of Catalonia 0.99 VAT included Apartments – holiday homes – tourist accommodation Barcelona City 2.48 VAT included and Rest of Catalonia 0.99 VAT included Rest of accommodation types Barcelona City 0.72 VAT included and Rest of Catalonia 0.50 VAT included. Tax is payable directly at the hotel upon arrival.
